name: Topic
description: The AWS::SNS::Topic type creates an Amazon SNS topic.

properties.name: DisplayName
properties.description: A developer-defined string that can be used to identify this SNS topic.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.description: The SNS subscriptions (endpoints) for this topic.

properties.name: TopicName
properties.description: A name for the topic. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the topic name. For more information, see Name Type.

attributes.name: TopicName
attributes.description: Returns the name for an Amazon SNS topic.
